item.description:
For April's dinner, we'll visit Trattoria Romana in Lincoln (right across the street from the Lincoln  Mall.

Here's there website:

http://www.trattoria-romana.com/lincoln.html

This dinner is limited to 8 attendees.  I cannot increase our reservation size. 

The restaurant only has 2 tables that seat more than 8 people and they are only scheduled at 5:15/5:30 which is too early and 7:45/8:00 which is too late.

Hope you can make it.
item.how_to_find_us: A reservation has been made in my name

group.name: Rhode Island Dining Out Meetup Group

item.name: April Dinner - Trattoria Romana in Lincoln
